content.summary: 2.5 years of industry experience in QA & Manual Testing with expertise in Functional & Non-Functional Testing, Mobile Testing, Regression Testing, and API Testing. Familiar with Agile methodology and test documentation.

experience.title: QA Executive
responsibilities: Understanding the business requirements, preparing test scenario, test data & test cases.
Involvement in Test Execution, Results Analyzing and Defect Reporting.
Conducting Data Driven Testing, Cross Browser Testing, API Testing and Parallel Test Execution.
Reviewed Test Reports and Prepared Summary Reports.
Managing Daily Status Report and Weekly Status Report.

responsibilities: Preparing End User Guide PPTs For All The Modules.
Knowledge In The Area Of Manual Testing.

responsibilities: Understanding Requirement Specifications And Design Documents.
